data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: What is your favorite genre of film, television, or literature? What do you like most about the genre? What is your favorite story in this genre, and what makes this story interesting?
data.answer: Among all the genres of film or literature, historical drama is definitely my favorite. Some historical dramas focus more on how to recreate the original scenes of a certain period, while other dramas tend to combine some fictional factors with history. For example, it may talk about a college student, who likes researching history, and occasionally travels back to ancient times and has a magical experience.   My collection of historical dramas is ranging from stories in ancient Chinese dynasties to European kingdoms. The Kangxi Dynasty is a historical television drama that I keep watching for more than three times. It depicts the lifetime of a legendary emperor on how he was dedicated to developing a country from military, agriculture and business aspects. The fantasy costume and grand setting specifically designed make me more involved into that drama.  While learning history, I can also feel the relations and feelings among characters, such as the pressure in royal family and trust between the emperor and generals. (164字)
